title: ニョロニョロの秘密
description: Continuing from their encounter on the ghost island, the Moomin family must weather a sudden storm while trapped with the mysterious Hattifatteners. When the storm passes, they explore the island's other side and discover treasures washed ashore, including a beautiful ship's figurehead that captivates Moomin. Floren's hair gets damaged by an electrically-charged Hattifattener, causing her distress.
